name: Treasure Island (itch) (Abhi_mehta)
description:
The long tiresome journey has finally paid off and it's time for the spoils. Captain Sack Jarrow is on a mission to collect all the loot from the treasure islands.
You snooze you lose!
But beware, for the sea spares none...
How much loot is in your destiny?

Controls:
Space: Jump, Double Jump (once when airborne)

Hold Space to Jump higher

For Trijam GameJam, All assets, scripts are created by the creator except for the royalty-free music from Bucanneer available under creative commons license.

The game was made in about 4 hours.
